import React,{useEffect, useState} from 'react' import DatePicker from 'react-date-picker'; function Appoinment({props}) { const [form, setForm] = useState({}); const obj = { name: "footwear", number:"9918991232", doctor: "Canada", address:"221 baker street", time: "16:50", date:"2022-09-22", issue:"footwear footwear footwear footwear footwear footwear footwear footwear footwear footwear footwear footwear" } var todayDate = new Date().toISOString().slice(0, 10); const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(form); } useEffect(()=>{ setForm(obj) },[]) console.log(obj) return ( <>
{/*
*/}
